Hi, I have a question. assume you send an email to your friend. what is the port address showing now? your friend may open his/her email with different browsers which have different port addresses.

how can device at one end of a country know the port address of another device ?    In mac address, you said, it is of immediate next node address.  But what about port address! If I'm using chrome and another computer is using firefox, how can my pc know his port address!?
In One Day Gained enough knowledge required for 1 Month . THANKS a lot
Thankyou sir

actually when you open different windows in a browser. sure the port address is different. but actually you are accessing the google servers, so it makes no difference. a small hint given. hope you get the point.
